Definition: An inclusion or exclusion criterion as part of defining a cohort.

Short: The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.
Definition: The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.

Short: The value or range of the characteristic.
Definition: The value or range of the characteristic.

Short: If true, exclude the subjects that match the criterion.
Definition: If true, exclude the subjects that match the criterion.

Short: A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
Definition:
A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
If the start date/time is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end date/time is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.
